org.optaplanner.core.api.score

Class AbstractBendableScore<S extends FeasibilityScore<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.optaplanner.core.api.score.AbstractScore<S>
      • org.optaplanner.core.api.score.AbstractBendableScore<S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<S>, Score<S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BendableBigDecimalScore, BendableLongScore, BendableScore

    public abstract class AbstractBendableScore<S extends FeasibilityScore<S>>
extends AbstractScore<S>
    Abstract superclass for bendable Score types.

    Subclasses must be immutable.

    See Also:
    BendableScore, Serialized Form

                                                     String scoreString)

      • getHardLevelsSize

        public abstract int getHardLevelsSize()
        The sum of this and getSoftLevelsSize() equals getLevelsSize().
        Returns:
        >= 0 and < getLevelsSize()

      • getSoftLevelsSize

        public abstract int getSoftLevelsSize()
        The sum of getHardLevelsSize() and this equals getLevelsSize().
        Returns:
        >= 0 and < getLevelsSize()

      • getLevelsSize

        public abstract int getLevelsSize()
        Returns:
        getHardLevelsSize() + getSoftLevelsSize()
